page.title: 15The Supernatural In Hoo.
page.content:
There are also many different superstitions in Hoo. Pupils of Hoo Middle school once believed that their school was haunted by a caretaker.This was purely superstition.In the graveyard there is a large Yew Tree on which are three red marks.Children called these {Devil Marks }and then dance around the tree,saying that they have seen the Devil. Also there are stories that there is a haunted bungalow in{Bells Lane}and a {Grey Lady.}There is another story about a man who, while digging a grave gave a passer-by a shock as he was mistaken to be a ghost. { }Many stories come and go but nobody can tell what the future holds.{ }
{By A Ford, N Mudie, J Wooster, {L Tilbury and S Beadle.}
